item.title: Databases
item.description: Warning The answers here are given by the community. Be careful and double check the answers before using them. If you see an error, please create a PR with a fix. Edit questions Legend 👶 easy ‍⭐ medium 🚀 expert Name types of join methods RDBMS (e.g. postres) supports? ‍⭐️ As of today, postgres supports three join methods: nested loops hash join merge join TBD

item.title: Distributed computing
item.description: Warning The answers here are given by the community. Be careful and double check the answers before using them. If you see an error, please create a PR with a fix. Edit questions Legend 👶 easy ‍⭐ medium 🚀 expert What is Apache Hive Metastore? 👶 Metastore is a Hive serivce to store Hive tables and partitions metadata in any JDBC compliant relational database.

item.title: Message broker
item.description: Warning The answers here are given by the community. Be careful and double check the answers before using them. If you see an error, please create a PR with a fix. Edit questions Legend 👶 easy ‍⭐ medium 🚀 expert What is Quality of Service? 👶 The Quality of Service (QoS) level is a sender-receiver agreement to define the guarantee of a message delivery.
